content: Total SG&A expenses in the quarter, excluding stock-based compensation and the prior year facility fees use charge of $9 million improved by approximately $1 million versus Q4 2021, driven largely by lower third-party fees and expenses. With this in mind, weâre providing the following guidance for full year 2023: revenue in a range of $720 million to $745 million; adjusted EBITDA in a range of $165 million to $175 million; adjusted net income in a range of $100 million to $110 million; and adjusted diluted earnings per share in a range of $1.30 to $1.43, based on a fully diluted share count of $77 million.
